body:
Refactored directive design:

## %skip
- Works at: _setup.txt (skips suite), file-level, test-level
- Syntax: %skip, %skip(message), %skip if: command, %skip(message) if: command  
- Conditional skip runs in the file's shell (or default)

## %platform (NEW)
- Works at: _setup.txt, file-level only
- Syntax: %platform windows or %platform unix, mac, linux
- Comma-separated list, no 'not' support
- Skips all tests if current platform not in list

## %shell
- Works at: file-level only (no test-level!)
- Co-validated with %platform before tests run
- Error if incompatible (e.g. %shell cmd + %platform unix)

Defaults: bash on Unix, PowerShell on Windows
title: cctr directive design: %skip, %platform, %shell
